burtis.modules.network

Class NetworkConfigFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • burtis.modules.network.NetworkConfigFactory

  • public class NetworkConfigFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Saves and reads NetworkConfig into and from Properties. Only static methods.
    Author:
    Amadeusz Sadowski

      • SaveToProperties

        public static void SaveToProperties(NetworkConfig config,
                                    java.util.Properties properties)
        Saves full configuration to provided Properties object.
        Parameters:
        config - - the configuration to save.
        properties - - the properties to save in.

      • ReadModuleConfig

        private static ModuleConfig ReadModuleConfig(java.util.Properties properties,
                                             java.lang.String serverAddress,
                                             int moduleIndex)
        Reads full configuration of single module.
        Parameters:
        properties - - the properties to read config from.
        serverAddress - - address of server for read module config.
        moduleIndex - - the index of read module, used to retrieve corect properties.
        Returns:
        The new module of given index read from provided properties object.

      • SaveModuleToProperties

        private static void SaveModuleToProperties(java.util.Properties properties,
                                           ModuleConfig moduleConfig,
                                           int index)
        Saves single module configuration.
        Parameters:
        properties - - the properties to save config to.
        moduleConfig - - the config to be saved.
        index - - index of module to differentiate multiple module configs in singel properties object.
